title: Poster, "Cloud Hands, Center for T", 20th century
inscribed: Imprinted in black ink, center right: SX
description:
Large calligraphy character in red overall; 5 tiny figures in red. Imprinted sideways in black, upper margin: Tai Chi Ch’uan / Instructors: / Tem Horwitz and Susan Kimmelman are / co-directors of Cloud Hands, founders of / MoMing, and co-authors of Tai Chi / Ch’uan: The Technique of Power. / Term: September 18 to December 23 (14 / weeks); below, imprinted straight: Schedule of Tai Chi: / Part I (Beginning) / M 6-7:30 W 6-7:30 Sat 10-12 / (Choose any 2 classes) / Part II / Tu 6-7:30 Th 6-7:30 / Part III / Fri. 6-7:30 / Review / Tu 6-7:30 / Fees: Part I $110 / Part II $100 / Part III & Review $100 / Review $50 / Trial Classes $3 / Enroll at first class session.
Lower right, sideways: Acupressure & Shiatsu / Wednesdays 8-9:30 pm / October 4—November 8 (Six Sessions) / Tuition: $50 Payable at first class. / Instructor: Hanna Takashige
Lower left: Cloud Hands / 9 W. Hubbard, Chicago, Illinois 60610 / 312 644-8087 & 348-0010

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "Cloud Hands, Center for T", 20th century.Offset lithograph on paper. 1991-69-18.
